title: "Taycleaning"
---

## Initial Questions

- Which album/song has the most acousticnesss?...for all categories
- Which song is the longest? Shortest?
- Which release year had the highest popularity?
- What year had the most and least energetic songs?
- Are longer or shorter songs more popular?
- Tempo vs danceability?
- tempo and duration?


## Set up

```{r}

#| label: setup
#| message: false
#| warning: false

library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)

```

```{r}
#| label: import

taylor_files_list <- list.files(
  "data-processed-taylor",
  full.names = T
)

taylor_files_list
```

```{r}
#| label: combine-files # maybe use changin column type here as a new function

taylor_all <- map(
  taylor_files_list,
  read_csv
) |>
  list_rbind() |>
  clean_names()

taylor_all |> glimpse()
```
